info.description: This is a forum API gateway service.
info.title: Forum API Gateway

get.description: Retrieve a list of all categories with optional pagination

post.description: Create a new category with given information

get.description: Retrieve a category by its unique ID
get.summary: Get a category by its ID

put.description: Update a category with the given information
put.summary: Update a category by its ID

delete.description: Delete a category by its unique ID
delete.summary: Delete a category by its ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of all post-tag relationships with optional filtering and pagination
